name: openfoam-generic
title: Generic OpenFOAM
description: Accepts path to OpenFOAM project folder & shell script filename as entry point for a computational fluid dynamics simulation.
content:
Bring Your Own OpenFOAM

Upload your own OpenFOAM (Open Source Field Operation and Manipulation) project files to Stash. Specify the shell script location and name in the app parameters, then launch your simulation. Your shell script should chain OpenFOAM commands like: blockMesh → potentialFoam → simpleFoam → paraFoam. OpenFOAM users typically automate workflows using shell scripts for complex simulation pipelines. Learn more about OpenFOAM here.
